description: Place where n-th 1 occurs in A023115.
comments: Positions of the integers when the numbers a + b*sqrt(2) are arranged in increasing order. - _Clark Kimberling_, Mar 16 2015
links: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: The ordering of numbers a+b*r, where r = sqrt(2) as in Comments, begins with 0, 1, r, 2, 1+r, 2r, 3, 2+r, 1+2r, 4, ... in which the positions of integers are 1, 2, 4, 7, 10.
